query: ALTER TABLE videos ADD COLUMN url varchar(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''; ALTER TABLE videos ADD COLUMN thumbnail varchar(500); ALTER TABLE videos ADD COLUMN platform enum('tiktok', 'instagram') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'tiktok'; ALTER TABLE videos MODIFY COLUMN category enum('training', 'highlights') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'training';
